ws.rocket.config.section.read

Class ValueListSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.rocket.config.section.read.NonBlankLineReader
      • ws.rocket.config.section.read.ValueListSection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SectionReader

    public final class ValueListSection
extends NonBlankLineReader
    A section reader that expects a value per line. By default, a value is expected to be a String, however, the target type can also be predefined so that data errors could be discovered quicker.
    Author:
    Martti Tamm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ValueListSection()
      Creates a new instance where rows will be treated as Strings.
      ValueListSection(Class<?> valueType)
      Creates a new instance where rows will be treated as defined by valueType.

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: SectionReader
        Resets the inner state so that the reader could be reused. The collection data object should be recreated, as it might alter the target configuration bean state.

      • readNonBlankLine

        protected void readNonBlankLine(String line,
                    ValueConverter converter)
                         throws SectionValueException
        Description copied from class: NonBlankLineReader
        Reads a new non-blank line of section data.
        Specified by:
        readNonBlankLine in class NonBlankLineReader
        Parameters:
        line - A section data line (with comments and surrounding whitespace removed).
        converter - A value converter to convert data to target type.
        Throws:
        SectionValueException - When the line data is not some how correct for this reader.

      • getResult

        public List<Object> getResult()
        Description copied from interface: SectionReader
        To be called after section data has been read: provides a collection of parsed data.
        Returns:
        A collection.

      • getValueType

        public Class<?> getValueType()
        Description copied from interface: SectionReader
        Provides the class name of the main value in the returned collection.

        The main value type in the collection (it is used to determine array component type). For a map, it's the type of the map keys (to check if they are Strings).

        Returns:
        A value type as class.

      • getCollectionType

        public Class<?> getCollectionType()
        Returns java.util.List.class.

        Provides the class name of the returned result collection. For example, java.util.List.class. This type should be general, not the precise implementation, unless that's an important hint to section writer.

        Returns:
        The result collection type as class.
